explains: n. 鳍状肢；鳍；烤饼；胖听罐头
vi. 靠鳍足（或鸭甲板）行动

sentences.en: Amazon dolphins bear little resemblance to our beloved Flipper.
sentences.cn: 亚马逊河豚和我们钟爱的鳍状肢动物一点儿都不像。

sentences.en: The green sea turtle, could only swim around in a very limited range because she only had one flipper.
sentences.cn: 这只绿海龟只能在很有限的范围里游，因为她只有一只鳍。

sentences.en: There is not much that the turtle can do about this without compromising the aerodynamic shape of the flipper.
sentences.cn: "如果海龟没有符合流体动力学结构的鳍的话，他们也不能解决这个问题。
